channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It Was Like Holding Huge Party With Moving Toasts and Magnificent Oratory—for the Spouse You're Divorcing
Former teacher reveals which students suffered 'the most' under Walz's pandemic-era guidelines
item.description: A former Minnesota teacher told Fox News Digital that rules enforced by Gov. Tim Walz during the coronavirus pandemic poorly impacted immigrant students.

item.title: House Intel's Turner: Iran Could Be Nuclear State by Year's End
item.description: U.S. House Intelligence Committee chairman Rep. Mike Turner, R-Ohio, said on Sunday that the Iranians "might declare themselves a nuclear weapons state by the end of this year." He blamed the Biden administration's policies for the rapid acceleration of the Islamic...

item.title: Kamala Harris’ Inability to Speak Coherently Is Pretty Weird
Obama to headline 2nd night of Democratic National Convention
item.description: Former President Barack Obama will headline the second night of the DNC under the banner of the Democrat Party's “Bold Vision for America’s Future."

item.title: Barack Obama Headlines DNC on Tuesday, Will Campaign for Harris
item.description: Former President Barack Obama will endorse the presidential bid of his longtime political ally Kamala Harris on Tuesday night in a high-profile speech aimed at boosting her new and untested presidential bid.

item.title: NEW: Trump Drops an Update on the Presidential Debate Schedule As Biden Ends DNC Speech
Florida's Rick Scott, Matt Gaetz to face primary challengers as several states head to polls Tuesday
item.description: Florida primary races feature Rep. Matt Gaetz, amid his feud with former House Speaker Kevin McCarthy, and Sen. Rick Scott, who hopes to lead the party in the Senate next Congress.

item.title: Trump: Harris Will Not Do Fox News Debate on Sept. 4
item.description: U.S. Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump said in a post on Truth Social late on Monday that Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris will not do a Fox News debate that was under consideration for Sept. 4. The former president said that he instead agreed to do a...

item.title: Biden DNC Speech Is a Historic Trainwreck - With a Slurring, Stumbling, Screaming Speech Full of Lies
Trump says Kamala Harris will not participate in Fox News debate on Sept. 4
item.description: Former President Trump claims Vice President Kamala Harris has declined to participate in a Fox News presidential debate in Pennsylvania on September 4.

item.title: Hillary Clinton: I Cracked Glass Ceiling for Kamala Harris
item.description: Former Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton continued her quest to put the first woman in the White House on Monday night, saying she "cracked" the "hardest glass ceiling" and sees Democrat nominee Kamala Harris on the other side of it.

item.title: Jill Biden Leads in to Joe Biden's Farewell Speech With a Re-endorsement of Kamala Harris
Put policy aside: Kamala Harris will win or lose based on the excitement factor
item.description: While the mainstream media is pining for a more comprehensive Kamala Harris policy agenda, substance may not appeal to the average voter in the 2024 Presidential election.

item.title: AOC Slams Trump As Union Buster at Dem Convention
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., a member of the far-left wing "Squad" of House Democrats and a frequent GOP antagonist, laid into former President Donald Trump on Monday night as the Democratic National Convention opened in Chicago.
